articles.title: Coca-Cola recalls popular product due to possible health risk - 'do not drink it' - Express
articles.description: Coca-Cola has recalled a limited amount of a popular product due to incorrect packaging. This may pose a risk to certain consumers.

articles.author: Tom Acres, technology reporter
articles.title: Race to the metaverse: The fight to shape the future of the internet - Sky News
articles.content:
Last week, I was invited to get my hair done in the metaverse.
In what was the strangest PR email I'd received for some time, a leading haircare manufacturer offered up a seat in a virtual salon, wh… [+9766 chars]
